sentence.Network_en: Inspiration from avantgarde movements like Futurism and Op Art. Speed , dynamism, visual sense of velocity.
sentence.Network_cn: 灵感来自先锋派,诸如未来主义和欧普艺术 、 视觉化的速度感.

sentence.Network_en: Futurism rejected all traditions and attempted to glorify contemporary life by emphasizing the machine and motion.
sentence.Network_cn: 未来学家拒绝一切传统,通过强调机器和运动来试图美化现代生活.

sentence.Network_en: Attention should be also paid to a curriculum system with characteristics of futurism and openness.
sentence.Network_cn: 设立具有前瞻性和开放性的课程体系.

derivation.yuyuan_name: from future + -ism, translating Italian futurismo, French futurisme

entry.tran: 未来主义(20世纪早期的现代艺术和文学运动)
entry.def: Futurism was a modern artistic and literary movement in the early twentieth century.

means.word_mean: 1. an artistic movement in Italy around 1910 that tried to express the energy and values of the machine age
2. the position that the meaning of life should be sought in the future
